alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 3:16AM CST until December 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches along and east of Boise City to Dalhart line with 3 to 6 inches west of that line. * WHERE...In Oklahoma, Cimarron County. In Texas, Dallam County. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Main cities to focus for this warning would be Boise City and all areas west of that for Oklahoma, and northwest Dallam County, mainly the Texline area for Texas.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Oklahoma, call 844-465-4997 for road information. In Texas, call 800-452-9292 for road information.
